reviews.review: Great professor! Explains complex concepts clearly and is always willing to help during office hours.

reviews.review: Engaging lectures and interesting assignments. Sometimes the workload can be heavy.

reviews.review: Knowledgeable but can be intimidating. Exams are very challenging.

reviews.review: Fantastic teacher! Makes history come alive with her storytelling approach.

reviews.review: Lectures are a bit dry, but the course material is solid. Fair grader.

reviews.review: Extremely helpful and patient. Great at explaining difficult biological concepts.

reviews.review: Tough but fair. Expects a lot from students but also provides excellent feedback.

reviews.review: Inconsistent in grading and often cancels classes at the last minute.

reviews.review: Brilliant researcher but not the best teacher. Can be hard to follow in lectures.

reviews.review: Passionate about the subject and it shows. Makes even complex philosophical concepts accessible.
reviews.subject: Philosophy
